title: Female Locomotion Pack
description: Motion Capture movement Animations for Female Character
longDescription:
Digital Kinetics brings you,


Female Locomotion Pack


This package features 54 Mocap animations for female general movement and a female game character model, making it ideal for creating smooth, third-person character movement in your game. The animations are versatile and can be used in any genre.


The pack includes walking, running, crouching, appropriate idles, and jumps.


Mo-capped body and fingers with the latest optical mocap technology.


Retargeted for Unreal Engine 5 Queen


Demo Video

technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Walking
  •  Running
  •  Crouching
  • Idle
  • Rotating

Rigged to Epic skeleton: (Yes)

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: (No)

Number of Animations: 54

Animation types (Root Motion):

Number of Characters: 1


Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
